location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Beatrice Lyall Aitchison, Gorton Castle, Simla to Lewis Pelly

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: Imperfect - A large piece of the paper booklet forming the bottom left corner of folios two and three has been torn off, however it does not affect the written contents of the letter.

mods.abstract: Letter refers to a note from Pelly which had gone missing but which had since arrived and discussing various matters relating to family and friends.These matters include the delivery of some bedding to Aboo [Abu]; news on the wellbeing of various friends; recent accidents, including one fatal accident, involving British subjects; and announcements of recent engagements.
